content:
Dear @RalfJ and @oli

It would appear that the Miri cron job build failed. Would you mind investigating this issue?

Thanks in advance!
Sincerely,
The Miri Cronjobs Bot
Thanks @hyd-dev for taking care of this :)
You're welcome! :smile: The breakage is actually trivial.
yeah but this way I didnt even have to investigate it and prepare a PR. :) usually the fix isn't the problem, the rest of the process often takes more time.
